text: Mark of Cornwall was a king of Cornwall and a character in the Arthurian Cycle of medieval literature.King Mark of Cornwall. www.cornwalls.co.uk. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. Specifically, Mark is the husband of Isolde, who upon falling in love with Tristan a tragic story that has been the subject of numerous literary versions from the Middle Ages to the present day.King Mark of Cornwall. www.cornwalls.co.uk. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. ==References== Category:People from Cornwall Category:Kings and Queens of England
title: Mark of Cornwall
